key.name: tweaks-enable
key.description: If set, the Gnome Tweaks button is shown.

key.name: tweaks-position
key.description: If set to -1, the position is automatic: Tweaks will show up after Settings. If set to zero or more, the actual launcher position on the system menu.

key.name: extensions-enable
key.description: If set, the Shell Extensions button is shown.

key.name: extensions-position
key.description: If set to -1, the position is automatic: Extensions will show up after Tweaks (if shown), or Settings. If set to zero or more, the actual launcher position on the system menu.
